DASS¶

template<typename K, class V>
class DASS_Verifier¶

Holds Binary Data Plane classes

Author

Xiaofeng Shi

template<typename K, class V>
class DASS_Tracker¶

Public Functions

void clear()¶

Clears the vacuum filter.

void rebuild(float lf, float othello_ratio)¶

Rebuilds the Tracker

Parameters

  • lf: TODO:write what this is

  • othello_ratio: The othello ratio

void init(uint32_t n_pos, uint32_t n_neg, float lf = 0.95, float othello_ratio = 1)¶

A constructor for DASS_Tracker

Parameters

  • n_pos: The number of positive keys.

  • n_neg: The number of negative keys.

  • lf: TODO:write what this is

  • othello_ratio: The othello ratio

int optimal_fp_len()¶

Calculates the optimal fp len

Return

The optimal fp len

bool batch_insert(const vector<K> &positive_keys, const vector<K> &negative_keys)¶

Inserts keys in batch

Return

false is if the structure was rebuilt and true if it wasn’t

Parameters

  • positive_keys: A vector of positive keys

  • negative_keys: A vector of negative keys

vector<uint32_t> insert(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Inserts a key value pair

Return

The flipped indexes from this insertion.

Parameters

  • kv: Key value pair to be inserted.

vector<uint32_t> setValue(pair<K, V> kv)¶

Sets the value of a key

Parameters

  • kv: Key value of the key to be set to a value.

void erase(K k)¶

Erases a key

Parameters

  • k: The key to be erased.

V query(const K key)¶

Queries the value of the key.

Return

The value of the key.

Parameters

  • key: The key to be queried.
